name: L'Abbaye des Morts
overview: Port of the original PC game by Juan Antonio Becerra Vilchez (Locomalito) & Javier Garcia (Gryzor87) In the 13th century, the Cathars, who preach about good Christian beliefs, were being expelled by the Catholic Church out of the Languedoc region in France. One of them, called Jean Raymond, found an old church in which to hide, not knowing that beneath its ruins lay buried an ancient evil. Now fate will test his faith.
